title: User login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using valid username and password, receiving a valid JWT token and access to protected routes.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a valid username and password
Click the login button
Verify that the login is successful and a JWT token is returned
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard and protected routes are accessible

title: User login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect username or password, and no token is issued.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter an invalid username or password
Click the login button
Verify that login is rejected and an appropriate error message is shown
Verify no JWT token is returned and access to protected routes remains blocked

title: JWT token expiration and logout
description: Validate that JWT tokens expire correctly and logout functionality invalidates tokens preventing further access.

steps.description: Login and obtain a JWT token
Wait for the token to expire or manually set token expiry
Verify that access to protected routes is denied after token expiry
Perform logout operation
Verify that the JWT token is invalidated and user cannot access protected routes

title: Create tenant with valid data
description: Verify creation of a tenant record with complete valid personal, contact, and rental history information.

steps.description: Navigate to tenant management page
Open new tenant form and input valid personal and contact data, including rental history
Submit the tenant creation form
Verify that tenant is created and visible in tenant list with correct details

title: Fail tenant creation with missing mandatory fields
description: Verify appropriate validation errors are shown when mandatory tenant fields are missing during creation.

steps.description: Navigate to tenant creation form
Leave mandatory fields empty and submit the form
Verify validation error messages appear for required fields
Verify that tenant is not created

title: Update tenant information
description: Verify that tenant information can be updated with valid changes and changes persist correctly.

steps.description: Select an existing tenant from the list
Edit personal and contact information fields
Submit the update
Verify the updated data is saved and displayed correctly

title: Delete tenant record
description: Verify tenant records can be deleted after confirmation, and no longer accessible after deletion.

steps.description: Select a tenant record for deletion
Confirm deletion in modal dialog
Verify tenant is removed from list
Verify tenant data is no longer retrievable from the backend

title: View property details and availability
description: Verify that properties list displays detailed information and current availability status correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to properties management page
Select a property to view details
Verify that property information is accurate including contracts and availability

title: Create and update property record
description: Verify creation of a new property and the ability to modify property details and save changes.

steps.description: Open new property form and provide valid information
Submit creation form
Verify property appears in the list with correct details
Edit the property details
Save the updated property information
Verify changes persist and are correctly displayed

title: Register payment and handle debts
description: Validate registering payments, updating tenant debt status, generating receipts and triggering alerts on due debts.

steps.description: Navigate to payment management page
Register a new payment linked to a tenant
Verify payment is logged correctly and tenant debt is updated
Generate payment receipt
Verify receipt details match payment data
Verify alerts appear for overdue debts

title: Fail payment registration with invalid inputs
description: Ensure payment registration fails gracefully with invalid or incomplete payment data and appropriate user feedback.

steps.description: Attempt to register a payment without required fields or invalid amounts
Verify validation error messages and rejection of payment
Verify no unintended changes to tenant debt or payment records

title: Create, save and update rental contracts
description: Verify flow for creating draft rental contracts, editing them, activating contracts, and viewing contract statuses.

steps.description: Navigate to contract management page
Create a new contract draft with required details
Save the draft contract
Verify draft contract is saved and listed with status 'Draft'
Edit draft and update contract information
Activate the contract
Verify contract status changes to 'Active' and details are updated correctly

title: Dashboard displays accurate business overview and reports
description: Verify dashboard loads correctly with real-time financial reports, income statistics, and user management data displayed appropriately.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to dashboard page
Verify current financial data and reports are rendered accurately
Verify recent activities and user management summaries are correct

title: API communication with type-safety enforced
description: Test that frontend and backend communicate using Eden Treaty API, enforcing type safety and consistency on requests and responses.

steps.description: Perform API calls from frontend for tenant CRUD operations
Verify the API enforces correct request/response structure and types without runtime errors
Perform invalid API calls with malformed data
Verify API returns correct validation errors and no unhandled exceptions

title: Database migrations preserve data integrity
description: Test that database migrations apply correctly and data remains consistent without loss or corruption.

steps.description: Seed database with test data
Apply new Prisma migrations
Verify schema changes applied correctly
Verify test data remains intact and queries return expected results

title: Centralized error handling and logging
description: Verify errors in API and frontend are captured, logged, and appropriate user-friendly messages are displayed.

steps.description: Force errors in backend API routes (e.g., invalid database queries)
Check that errors are logged centrally and meaningful error responses are sent
Cause error conditions in frontend components
Verify that error modals or notifications are shown to users gracefully

title: Consistent UI rendering with Material UI components
description: Verify the user interface uses Material UI components consistently, ensuring no layout or styling regressions across pages and dialogs.

steps.description: Navigate through all main pages (login, tenants, properties, payments, contracts, dashboard)
Verify UI components render correctly with consistent styling and expected behavior
Open forms and dialogs, interact with UI controls
Verify responsiveness and visual consistency using Material UI standards
